name: fullstackopen
description: Hello! This is my learning project taken from the free course on https://fullstackopen.com/en

scripts.build: cd frontend && rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install && npm run build && rm -rf ../backend/build && mv build ../backend && cd ..
scripts.start: npm run frontend & npm run backend
scripts.dev: npm run frontend-dev & npm run backend-dev

author: Samuel Martins
